content: this legal text is about a court case involving two parties the case was initially filed in the municipal court split and is now being heard in the county court varaždin 2nd instance the applicant has incurred costs of hrk 320000 and the opposing party who is a coowner is required to pay 12 of this amount additionally the opposing party must pay hrk 160000 for outofcourt procedure costs within 15 days the case involves the division of coownership of a real estate area measuring 311 m2 the opposing party filed an appeal contesting the decision made by the municipal court split claiming that the division had already been completed based on an agreement between the parties however the court found that the division was not completed and proceeded with the division of coownership the court rejected the appeal and confirmed the decision made by the firstinstance court
